vote.title: Authorize the City’s contracted broker of record, Marsh & McLennan Companies, Inc. to purchase insurance policies for commercial property, boiler and machinery and loss control, terrorism, cyber liability, fine arts, crime, aviation, flood, media professional liability, general liability, and other lines of coverage as needed for the period October 1, 2025 to September 30, 2026 - Not to exceed $15,261,509.25 - Financing: Risk Management Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize the City’s contracted broker of record, Marsh & McLennan Companies, Inc. to purchase insurance policies for commercial property, boiler and machinery and loss control, terrorism, cyber liability, fine arts, crime, aviation, flood, media professional liability, general liability, and other lines of coverage as needed for the period October 1, 2025 to September 30, 2026 - Not to exceed $15,261,509.25 - Financing: Risk Management Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
